title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with creamy egg sauce, pancetta, and Parmesan cheese.
ingredients: 50g grated Parmesan cheese, plus extra to serve
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente.
While the spaghetti is cooking, fry the pancetta in a skillet over medium heat until crisp.
In a bowl, beat together the eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and a generous amount of black pepper.
When the spaghetti is cooked, drain it and immediately add it to the skillet with the pancetta. Toss to combine.
Remove the skillet from the heat and quickly pour the egg and cheese mixture over the spaghetti. Toss continuously until the eggs thicken but do not scramble.
Serve immediately with additional grated Parmesan cheese and black pepper.
